Imports

events

Types

IBaseApp = concept app
    ## Interface common to both mobile and desktop applications
    app.life is EventSource[LifeEvent]
LifeEvent = object
  case kind*: LifeEventKind
  of AppStarted, AppWillExit:
      nil

  of WindowAdded, WindowWillForeground, WindowDidForeground,
     WindowWillBackground, WindowClosed:
      windowId*: int
Events that can happen to mobile apps 
LifeEventKind = enum
  AppStarted, AppWillExit, WindowAdded, WindowWillForeground, ## Mobile only
  WindowDidForeground,      ## Mobile only
  WindowWillBackground,     ## Mobile only
  WindowClosed

Consts

testconcepts = false
wiish_android = false
wiish_desktop = true
Indicates that this is a desktop app 
wiish_dev = false
Indicates that this isn't a packaged app, but rather running in dev mode 
wiish_ios = false
wiish_linux = false
wiish_mac = true
wiish_mobile = false
Indicates that this is mobile app 
wiish_mobiledev = false
wiish_windows = false

$, $, handle, emit, EventSource, handle, removeListener, addListener, newEventSource
